Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides support, counselling, information and advice for cardiac surgery patients and their relatives and friends prior to and after open heart surgery. Raises funds to donate special equipment to the Northern General Hospital Cardiac Unit. A volunteer team within the club meets regularly with hospital staff. Volunteers visit the cardiac wards to talk to patients awaiting surgery. Training provided. Events include annual draw, Christmas party, and other social events as arranged by members. Affiliated to the British Heart Foundation. Regional unit which services Sheffield and the surrounding area.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Mon in the month at 7pm (social meeting)
